text_block_list.text: The day before tryouts...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Whew...

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, that crisp acceleration! Narita<n>Brian's raw talent truly is
impossible<n>to ignore.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
She's still rough around the edges,<n>but that just means she
has endless<n>potential. I'm looking forward to her<n>
performance during tryouts tomorrow.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Figures... The real race isn't even 'til<n>tomorrow, but she's
already snagged<n>the spotlight. Oh well, that just gets<n>me
even more fired up!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hishiama...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Oh... Were you watching Brian too?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
She really is on a whole other level.<n>Are you serious about
going<n>one-on-one with her?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Dead serious. You should definitely<n>come check it out. It'll
be a race to<n>remember!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Hishiama... Why do you even care<n>about some nobody like
me?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Someday you're gonna have what ittakes to toughen me up—so Ican't just let you walk away. That'sall there is to it.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
On that note... Hey, Trainer! Quit<n>staring at Brian and help me
get some<n>last-minute practice in! What's on the<n>docket for
today?

Brian is undeniably a formidable<n>opponent, but there's no
doubt that<n>Amazon's skills are evolving as well.

Thanks to her instincts and natural<n>learning ability, our
sessions yield<n>results day by day, fostering her<n>continued
improvement.
After wrapping up our training, the big<n>day arrives.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The last race of today's tryouts will<n>be commencing shortly!
All eyes are<n>on Narita Brian, whose talents have<n>won her
high acclaim!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The Umamusume have all gathered at<n>the starting gates. Let
the 2,000-meter<n>turf race... begin!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Narita Brian falls from fourth to fifth<n>place, seemingly
unconcerned by the<n>widening gap in front of her! It's like<n>
she's out for a morning jog, folks!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Her movements are being carefully<n>scrutinized by Hishi
Amazon in<n>seventh place! And with that, they're<n>through
the first lap!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Hishiama...

Halfway through the race, Brian<n>makes an early move and
advances<n>into third place.
Then, as the runners round the fourth<n>corner...

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: I'll tear this track up!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
And there goes Narita Brian! Brian<n>takes the lead! She's
ahead of the<n>pack by three—now four lengths!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hah, I don't think so. Time for a<n>one-on-one!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Hishi Amazon is closing in from the<n>outside! She's holding
her own<n>against Brian with her powerful<n>stride!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Took you long enough. But don't get<n>cocky!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
With a fearsome burst of speed,<n>Narita Brian increases her
pace even<n>further! She tries to give Amazon the<n>slip, but—

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hyaaaaah!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Brian can't shake her off! Amazon<n>accelerates too! A fierce
battle is<n>unfolding before our eyes right here<n>on the final
straight!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: H-Hishiama!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
("Impossible" my ass! "Over" my ass!<n>No matter how many
times you lose, it<n>doesn't mean a thing!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: (As long as you refuse to lose toyourself right up to the bitter end,the match is never over!)

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Yaaaaah!

Ultimately, Amazon comes in a close<n>second, just shy of
Brian.

But her powerful performance stirs<n>the hearts of the
spectators, earning<n>her a rousing round of applause.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Dammit, I lost! But still—

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Sniffle, sob... Hishiamaaa! Th...That... That was incredible!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
C'mon, there's no reason to blubber<n>like that. So? You still
planning on<n>leaving the school?

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
Forget I said anything about it! I'm so<n>pumped up, I'm
going to start training<n>again from square one!

text_block_list.name: Miho Umamusume
text_block_list.text:
And someday... I'll be strong enough<n>to go one-on-one with
you, Hishiama!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Sure thing! I can't wait! ...Oh, huh?

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hey, Ama. I enjoyed that. Let's do it<n>again sometime.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Hah! Next time I'll be the one to tearup your track. Don't say I didn'twarn you, Brian!

text_block_list.name: Narita Brian
text_block_list.text: Hmph.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Excuse me, Hishi Amazon! I was<n>really impressed by that
competitive<n>spirit you displayed today. Please let<n>me scout
you!

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Oh, about that... Sorry, but I've already<n>found myself a
training partner. Ain't<n>that right, Trainer?

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Absolutely. That training regimen of<n>yours is part of the
reason I was able<n>to go one-on-one with Brian in the<n>first
place.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
I'm lookin' forward to even more<n>hot-blooded battles from
here on out,<n>Trainer... Hmm. Y'know, that sounds<n>kinda
stuffy.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: I know! How 'bout "Teach"?
choice_data_list: Sounds like something out of an old movie...
Sounds like something out of an old movie...

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text:
Like "Yeah, I dig it, Teach"? Hahaha,<n>that's not half bad!
Definitely got a<n>more friendly ring to it at least.

text_block_list.name: Hishi Amazon
text_block_list.text: Now then... Who should I go<n>one-on-one with next, Teach?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
And so, my days together with the<n>ever-dynamic Amazon
begin.
